ns2:test-suite.name: As a football I should be able to signin in theFa.com with valid credentials.Navigate to Squad Page by clicking on Men Senior Page.
ns2:test-suite.description: After that Logout from the theFA.com.

test-case.name: Login into the application with valid credentials
test-case.title: Login into the application with valid credentials

step.name: Given I am on the Home Page for FA "https://www.thefa.com/"
step.title: Given I am on the Home Page for FA "https://www.thefa.com/"

step.name: Then I click on sign in link and wait for sign in page
step.title: Then I click on sign in link and wait for sign in page

step.name: Then I should see FA Sign In Page
step.title: Then I should see FA Sign In Page

step.name: When I enter username in FA as "qafaplus@gmail.com"
step.title: When I enter username in FA as "qafaplus@gmail.com"

step.name: And I enter password in FA as "Qwerty123qa"
step.title: And I enter password in FA as "Qwerty123qa"

step.name: And click on Sign in button
step.title: And click on Sign in button

step.name: Then I am logged in to FA
step.title: Then I am logged in to FA
